overview: The movie unfolds from the perspective of a girl growing up in the outer boroughs of New York in the â€™90s. With parents newly arrived from Shanghai, the family works through the unique trials of ascending to the middle class. A coming-of-age tale told with insight and humor, the story offers a sweeping perspective on the humility and heartache of the immigrant experience, as told from the point of view of children and parents.
title: Sour Hearts
